name: Lobelia syphilitica
details: Gives a perfect picture of sneezing influenza, involving the posterior nares, palate, and fauces. Very depressed. Pain in forehead over eyes; pain and gas in bowels, followed by copious watery stools with tenesmus and soreness of anus. Pain in knees. Prickling in soles. GREAT OPPRESSION IN LOWER PART OF CHEST, as if air could not reach there. PAIN IN CHEST UNDER SHORT RIBS OF LEFT SIDE. Dry, hacking cough. Breathing difficult. Dull, aching pain over root of nose. Eustachian catarrh. Pain in posterior part
